document_data.name: Undead Form
document_data.mainbody: '''''Undead form''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] and [[necromancy]] [[spell]] from the [[necromantic sphere]] that allowed the caster to assume the form and abilities of a type of [[undead]].
document_data.Effects: The caster was unable to cast any spells while in ''undead form''. The spell lasted for several minutes depending on the skill of the caster.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] a small piece of bone or flesh from the body of the undead being to cast.
document_data.History: ''Undead form'' was granted to [[priest]]s of [[Velsharoon]], the Lich Lord.
